pdftotext_missing: pdftotext is not installed. Install: sudo apt install poppler-utils
usage:
Usage: php resolve_pdf_ips.php <pdf_file> [options]
Options:
  --mikrotik, -m           Generate MikroTik .rsc import file
  --list-name=NAME         Custom address list name (default: fstek_ban)
  --locale=en|ru           Set language (default: auto-detect)

Examples:
  php resolve_pdf_ips.php report.pdf
  php resolve_pdf_ips.php report.pdf -m --list-name=malicious --locale=ru
